title: Interpretation of the dream of drinking wine in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol: We find that there are a large number of scholars who have provided an interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol, and to find out what its effects are and the most important things to know, for an unmarried woman and a pregnant girl, let us get to know the interpretation of each of them in detail. Interpretation of dreams The interpretation of dreams depends on a number of scholars who present it in detail. , such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Shaheen and other major interpretation scholars, and today through the website. Various. We will find the interpretation of the dream of drinking wine. What do scholars think about this matter? The interpretation of the dream of drinking wine by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of the dream of drinking wine in a dream for a sick person is a sign of recovery from Illness and relief of pain. Whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking alcohol, this is a sign of kindness and enormous wealth that will come to him in the coming days. When a married woman sees that she is drinking alcohol in a dream, this indicates the family stability in which the woman lives in those days. Dream of a single girl Drinking alcohol in a dream is evidence of a close marriage with a good young man. Drinking alcohol in a dream and reaching the point of intoxication is evidence that he will be blessed with money mixed with the forbidden money, and that he will waste money uselessly. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol according to Nabul: Whoever dreams of drinking alcohol is a sign of disobedience and the dreamer’s sins, He must repent and return to God, Blessed and Most High. Dreaming of drinking alcohol in a dream is a sign of non-permissible money that the dreamer will acquire in those days. The interpretation of seeing a person drinking alcohol and reaching the stage of drunkenness in the dream is a sign of the death of the good deeds and deeds that the dreamer enjoyed in the dream. That period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol for a man: If a man dreams that he is drinking alcohol and there is foam in the cup, this is evidence of his inability to bear the responsibilities that fall on his shoulders in those days. When a man sees that he is drinking alcohol and has reached the stage of intoxication, it is a sign On the money he gets or the position that will come to him in those days, it also indicates lack of knowledge and lack of knowledge. Things that revolve around him. When a man sees that he is drinking alcohol in a dream, this indicates the sorrows and anxiety that the dreamer will suffer in the coming period. If an unmarried young man sees himself drinking alcohol until he gets drunk, this indicates the presence of a girl who wants to get married and continue in that Days, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about fish for married people by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing drinking alcohol and wine in a dream about one girl. When an unmarried girl sees herself drinking alcohol in a dream, this is evidence of her success in achieving the goals and aspirations that she was trying to achieve. Seeing drinking wine in a dream An unmarried girl indicates her marriage and the happiness that she will achieve, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is drinking alcohol and getting drunk, this is evidence of the weakness of her character and that she is doing some bad deeds due to her lack of awareness of the situation in general. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol for a married woman. When a married woman dreams that she is drinking alcohol, this is evidence Although she is a distracted and volatile personality in many cases

preview.html: But does the interpretation have the same meaning in the case of a single woman, a man, a pregnant woman, a young man, or a married woman? From the translator’s website, we will present it in detail, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing Surah Q in a dream for a single girl. Also, seeing a single girl sleeping while reading Surah Q is one of the visions worthy of praise. It indicates The ability to preserve a girl’s life and transform it for the better. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream that she is reading Surah S. is evidence that she will soon marry a good man, who will give her a happy life full of joy. If the girl is studying, the vision indicates that she will advance in her studies and excel. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream reading Surah Q means that she will get a promotion at work. She will have a high status among people. Seeing an unmarried girl listening to Surah Q in a dream is evidence of her ability to fulfill her desires. If she sees a stranger reciting the surah to her. It means that she is about to marry a good man. If he is against someone in the vision, then this is evidence of the end of this quarrel. Reading Surat S in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of her freedom from problems and worries. See also: Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream. Interpretation of following Surat S in a dream For a married woman: Seeing a married woman in a dream reciting Surah Q is a promising vision of good and happy news. The vision also indicates the stability of her married life and free of troubles. Seeing a married woman in her dream reciting Surah Q and not having children. The vision means that God will take care of her after waiting. If She was married and her husband works as a merchant. The vision indicates that he will obtain high profits in his work. Surah S in a dream for a married woman is evidence of her good morals and religion. Seeing a married woman in a dream that she recites Surat S, and is satisfied with it. It means his superiority and success in reality. If he is afflicted The son of a married woman is ill and she saw herself reading a surah in a dream. The vision was good news for his recovery, God willing. Interpretation of seeing Surat S in a dream for a man and its meaning. Seeing a man in a dream that he is listening to Surat S. A vision indicates that he has been promoted at work, and that he has the ability to achieve Whatever he wants. Likewise, a man seeing in a dream that he is listening to Surah Q and has no children. The vision shows that his wife is pregnant and that this pregnancy will produce a boy from her. If the man is a merchant, then the vision indicates material gains. Hearing Surah Q in a married man’s dream is evidence On the abundance of sustenance and the abundance of money. The meaning of seeing Surah Q in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is reading Surah Q, this means an easy and natural birth. It also represents the end of the stressful stage of labor. Surah Q in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a male child. And that this child be healthy, with the health and integrity of his parents. Seeing Surah Q in a pregnant woman’s dream means family stability. And good news about the birth of a new baby. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream while reciting Surah Q means the end of her problems with her husband. And she will be happy with her children and husband. If she If a pregnant woman is at the beginning of her pregnancy, Surat S indicates that the pregnancy period passed peacefully. Interpretation of seeing Surat S in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing sunflower seeds in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sunflower seeds or sunflowers in a dream or vision through the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing sunflower seeds in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a sign of good or a harbinger of evil, and interpreters have differed in the interpretation of seeing sunflower seeds in a dream, depending on the condition and circumstances of the dreamer, and whether he is a single man or woman, married or pregnant. . Today, through Roya’s website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing sunflower seeds in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Nabulsi, and Imam al-Sadiq, follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing sunflower seeds in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing sunflower seeds in a dream. To positive changes in the dreamer’s life, whether in his work or in his life. Seeing sunlight directed at sunflowers in a dream indicates that the dreamer is making a great effort to be able to achieve his goals in life. Seeing sunflowers without the sun around him in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires The dreamer, but after a long time. See also: Interpretation of seeing cabbage in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing sunflower seeds in a dream for a single woman: Seeing lonely people with sunflower seeds in a dream It indicates that she will soon be engaged to a good man who will make her happy. Seeing lonely people eating seeds Sunflowers in a dream indicate the end of all problems and obstacles in her life. Seeing an unmarried woman as rain in a place with sunflowers in a dream indicates a happy and successful life that she will live in the future with her husband, and God knows best. Seeing a single woman eating sunflower seeds in a dream indicates the fulfillment of a desire. Long awaited. Seeing lonely people with sunflower seeds in a dream may indicate that she will gain a prominent position in her work. See also: Interpretation of seeing white cabbage in a dreamWhat is the interpretation of seeing sunflower seeds in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman carrying sunflower seeds in a dream indicates stability And happiness in her married life. Seeing a married woman carrying sunflower seeds while her husband was sick in a dream, announcing that her husband will recover from this illness in the coming period, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman carrying sunflower seeds in a dream may indicate an improvement in her financial situation during this period. Seeing a woman A married woman eating sunflower seeds in a dream indicates the emotional relationship between her and her husband and raising good children. See also: Interpretation of seeing the sunrise from the west in a dream Interpretation of seeing sunflower seeds in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman carrying sunflower seeds in a dream indicates her date of birth The next and it will pass easily. Seeing a pregnant woman eating sunflower seeds in a dream indicates the birth of a good child who will be fair to her and always work to please her. What is the interpretation of seeing sunflower seeds in a dream for a divorced woman: Seeing divorced sunflower seeds in a dream indicates the great success that she will achieve In your work. The divorced person sees that he sees sunflower seeds in a dream

title: Interpretation of the revelation of the face in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the revelation of the face in a dream. Expressions differed in the interpretation of the revelation of the face in a dream, but we can say that the final conclusion in this regards the state of the face and the state of the face. The face can be ugly or good, and it can be blue, black, red, or white, and these cases are mentioned in the Holy Qur’an, where the dreamer could be a man or a woman alone, pregnant or otherwise, and based on that they interpreted that vision. Interpretation Revelation of the face in a dream: If he sees in a dream a woman with her face uncovered in front of him, then this indicates the distress that will befall him if the uncovered one is ugly. If the uncovered one is beautiful, then this indicates comfort and good news, God willing. And if he recognizes the woman who uncovered her face before him, then this indicates his closeness to her. She was not married. If she is married, this is good news from God Almighty. If the exposed face is large, this indicates the high status and status that awaits him. If the exposed face is blue, this indicates a criminal act, and if it is yellow, it indicates humiliation and humiliation, and if it is reddish white, it indicates Goodness, God willing, and happiness. If the face he saw was strange and he could not distinguish it, then this indicates his enemies who harbor evil against him. If he sees that the owner of the face is dead and he is laughing, then this indicates that God Almighty has forgiven the dead person. And if that dead person is unseen, then this indicates If a woman sees in her dream that she is uncovering her face in front of a strange man, then this indicates her bad luck, unless she reveals her face smiling, then this is good news, God willing. If she is veiled and exposes her face in public, this may indicate a misfortune that affects her relationship with her husband, and problems that may end in divorce, and this may be caused by some of those close to them. Supposedly. Take care of her yourself. Interpretation of uncovering the face in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees that she is uncovering her face in a dream, this means that she does not want to get married. If she uncovers her hair and face, this indicates the many worries and concerns that await her, so may God help her. Also, uncovering the face in relation to For an unmarried woman, according to some opinions, it could indicate a financial loss. As for exposing the face among people, it may indicate a scandal that takes place in public or that it occurred with immorality, so beware. Interpretation of a pregnant woman exposing her face: If a pregnant woman sees that she has uncovered her face, this indicates problems with childbirth. Which may affect her. Exposing her hair indicates an illness that will affect her child and a difficult birth, so she must be patient and consider it. If a woman is pregnant and sees in her dream that her face is uncovered and black in color, this indicates that she will give birth to a female. Someone in a dream on several occasions.

title: Interpretation of a dream about not being able to walk in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing yourself unable to walk in a dream means that you are facing difficulties and problems. Whether it is visions such as difficulty walking, heaviness in walking, inability to move, stumbling when walking or being unable to get out of a place, or I cannot run, we will explain all of that in detail by Ibn Sirin and for the unmarried girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, the man, and more explanations to complete. Subject: Interpretation of not being able to walk in a dream. Whoever sees that he is unable to walk in a dream, then this is a stressful issue that he faces in life, or something that he wants but does not get, and God knows best. Not being able to walk in a visionary dream means that there are some obstacles that prevent him from Completing their work. Whoever sees that he cannot walk in a dream, the vision indicates a delay in some actions due to a lack of trust in certain people. This vision is also interpreted through the life of the visionary with many failures. As for seeing not walking due to a disability in a dream, it indicates a problem, and according to some Interpreters, this vision indicates not going on the trip that the dreamer wants to go on or not taking the trip that he wants. The person who sees that he has one leg and therefore cannot walk, this indicates the loss of a close friend of yours. Difficulty moving in the dream means that you have entered into a business that includes partnerships with other people, but unfortunately this partnership will only succeed for a short period. Not walking sometimes indicates a heavy burden that will not work. The dreamer is able to endure and not get up under a job full of difficulties, cruelty and fatigue. A dream in which you cannot walk means that you are afraid that something fundamental in your life has stopped or something very important has been lost from your life. The vision shows that there is a very fundamental factor that prevents you from achieving your goal: It could be a lack of money, your social status, or the limited availability of a particular resource. You may have a goal that you see others achieving but for some reason you cannot figure out how to do it yourself. Being unable to walk in a dream means that the dreamer may have lost the help of someone or some entity, and suddenly disappeared. All the support they gave you, making you feel weak and helpless. Dreaming of difficulty moving or being unable to walk in the dream may indicate that a parent or friend has moved to another city, making you feel unstable in your life. Seeing the inability to stand in The dream, the vision literally expresses the fear of standing on your feet and supporting yourself to achieve your goals, it does not mean that you will fail, it just means that you have natural fear and hesitation, and hesitation in itself is not bad, it shows us our weaknesses and makes us work on these things as best we can. To dream that you cannot walk in your dream may mean that you feel that you cannot keep up with the world's expectations or your own expectations. Some difficulty for you, so you should work on expressing this feeling and find out if you really need the help of a friend or someone close to you to complete these projects. The psychological interpretation of not walking in a dream is the person who

title: Interpretation of a dream about newspapers in a dream of senior imams

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about newspapers in a dream: Newspapers are considered one of the most important means of knowing news in various fields, whether political, economic or social, and many depend on them to receive and know reliable news. Expression, opinion, as well as the newspaper can also be part of our dreams, as it can come in a dream in several cases, and we will learn through the various website. Interpretation of a dream about newspapers in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about newspapers in a dream: Seeing newspapers in a dream means that the dreamer will hear new news soon if it is Old newspapers in a dream, this indicates the dreamer’s bad psychology, but if the newspapers are colored in the dream, this indicates the psychological and calm happiness of the viewer. If the dreamer is reading a children’s newspaper, this indicates that he is a childish person in his behavior. If the newspaper is empty and nothing is written on it, this indicates The emptiness, routine, and boredom that the viewer experiences. As for the newspaper full of words and news, it indicates that the fortuneteller’s mind is occupied by many thoughts, his agitation, and his instability. title: Interpretation of seeing a father in a dream for an unmarried woman, according to Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of seeing a father in a dream. It is one of the dreams in which the dreamer feels happiness overwhelming him, because of its symbols and repercussions that bring safety, security, friendliness, and intimacy. It should be noted that seeing a father in a dream varies depending on the vocabulary surrounding the dream. We will discover what is the interpretation of a father seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, according to what the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin said in his book Interpretation of Dreams. The father always symbolizes the safety and future of the family and without the person feeling lost. The vision and wishes to know its interpretation, so he turns to scholars and dream interpreters to interpret his vision. Dream interpreters say that the interpretation of this vision varies according to the social status of the sleeping person, and that is why we will explain to you through the following paragraphs of the encyclopedia what is the interpretation of the father who is watching in his dream. One girl in detail, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing a father in a dream. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi presented various interpretations related to seeing a father in a dream, which we take into consideration in the following lines: He interpreted the dream of a father to pray for his son for the righteousness of this son, and the justice of his actions, but if he sees in a dream that his father is praying for him ; This symbolizes excessive good deeds. Dreaming of a son beating his father in a dream indicates justice and happiness in the world that the dreamer enjoys. While seeing a father in a dream symbolizes the expulsion of one of his children. This symbolizes that she depends on him to bear responsibility. A quarrel between the mother and father in a dream also indicates that the family is coming together in a state of friendship and peace. Seeing the father dancing in a dream symbolizes his entering the stage of weakness and gray hair. As for seeing the father in a dream getting married. This symbolizes his connection to the life of this world and God gave him health and well-being, and this interpretation comes in the context of a dream about the death of a father in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a father in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says in his book Interpretation of Dreams that seeing a father in a dream symbolizes the presence of bond and security. In the lives of children. If the sleeper sees in his dream that his father is smiling and happy, this is a good vision that promises the dreamer that goodness and happiness will come to his life in the very near future. If the sleeper sees in his dream that his father is giving him a gift, then this is a good vision that indicates that God will take care of the dreamer and protect him. From all harm. Seeing a happy father in a dream indicates the good psychological state that the dreamer is experiencing, and this vision also shows the collapse of worries and problems. Imam Ibn Sirin says that seeing a father in a dream symbolizes the presence of many good qualities in the dreamer’s personality, such as honesty and sincerity. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is talking to his father, and the father gives advice to the father, then the dreamer must follow this advice and do as his father ordered him to do. To dream that you are talking to your father symbolizes the success that the dreamer will achieve in his life in the coming period. Also, seeing the father in a dream It indicates the return of someone who has been absent for a long time. The respected Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that seeing a father in a dream indicates that a lot of goodness and livelihood will come.

title: Interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about small green snakes and interpretation of a dream about many snakes

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream: We often see many things in reality and then see them in a vision during sleep, and the feeling that we get when we see something can be the same feeling in a dream, and this is clear when we see snakes in a dream upon waking up or in a dream that also symbolizes Many clues and symbols, due to the different details that the fortuneteller narrates and the feeling that he experiences, so what does seeing snakes in a dream symbolize? What is the interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about snakes symbolizes cunning and cunning enemies and they try by all legal and illegal means to spoil the dreamer’s life and cause... He is in a lot of pain. The vision expresses a certain type of enemy who feeds the dreamer nothing but all evil and hatred, so the dreamer must take the initiative, if he is wrong, to apologize and ask for peace. Snakes in a dream indicate many problems And the successive crises, the inability to reach safety, and the difficult period that the dreamer is going through. Seeing snakes is also a sign of Satan’s obsessions that corrupt the dreamer, and makes him more anxious about his present and future, which prompts him to take wrong paths and fall into the schemes placed on him. Seeing snakes A sign of the disorder, desires and whims of the soul, taking wrong paths and closed paths, and wasting time and effort on useless things. If the snakes focus on the enemy, this enemy may be weak or strong, close to the fortuneteller or far from him, and we can know this by seeing the size of the snake. Its shape and color: If the snakes are wild, then this indicates a distant enemy or a person belonging to a country different from the country of the fortuneteller. Whoever sees in his dream that snakes are walking behind him, this indicates the enemy who waits for him and watches him all day in his retreats and meetings in order to study him carefully, so that he has He has powers that he can use against him. The right moment. Snakes may symbolize a neighbor who is hostile to the dreamer in word and deed, and who by nature tends to disagree and differ instead of agreeing and unifying visions. If the dreamer sees snakes falling from above, this indicates the death of a person who has status and leadership among the people. If snakes emerge from the ground, this is a sign of... The corruption and torment that will prolong this land and its people. If snakes are in a large orchard or garden, this is a sign of growth, prosperity, and increased yields. And if he sees that he is killing a snake, this indicates success in achieving goals, defeating enemies, achieving desired goals, and achieving goals. A vision of killing a snake is considered Her fighting is an indication of the strength of her character, and she is characterized by intelligence and the ability to deal with different situations accordingly. Based on the evidence cited by Al-Nabulsi to explain the vision of snakes, we find the following: Snakes in a dream symbolize a persistent enemy who follows according to the nature of the situation, and the dreamer may consider him his friend and be surprised that he One of his fiercest enemies. Al-Nabulsi believes that it also symbolizes the country, the state, and the status that a

title: Interpretation of clouds in a dream: Seeing clouds in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a white or black cloud. The cloud is held in the hand of an unmarried woman. For a pregnant woman, clouds falling on the ground by Ibn Sirin. Clouds indicate Islam in which people live and their salvation. They are a symbol of mercy and divine providence because clouds carry water that contains the life of all beings. Clouds in a dream indicate knowledge and knowledge. And jurisprudence, wisdom and clarification because of the hidden wisdom that exists when the loader runs through the air and from the water that is compressed by it, which is the beginning of life. Clouds in some interpretations indicate soldiers and soldiers because they carry water as if they are serving people and providing them with protection and security. Clouds also indicate camels loaded with good things, Like food and cloth, when it was said: They indicate clouds, as God Almighty said in Surat Al-Ghashiya, verse 17: They do not look at camels, so how were they? Created? Clouds in a dream or a dream may refer to ships sailing in the sea carrying blessings and good deeds. Clouds indicate a woman’s pregnancy because they carry water and put it in their bellies, unless God allows them to expel it or bring it down. Clouds in some visions announce themselves and are therefore a harbinger of rain. The clouds show signs of the Sultan, his torment, or his orders, if these clouds are dark and black, or accompanied by something that indicates hardship, such as lightning and stones, along with what happened to the misguided people among them. He thought it was an opportunity to fall upon them, so he brought them martyrdom through negligence. Whoever sees clouds in his house, or sees clouds in his room, he will be guided by Islam, or from the repentant, or he will be granted forgiveness and mercy from the Forgiving, the Merciful. But if the dreamer sees clouds chasing him, then he will gain Knowledge or judgment if he is honest, or his wife’s pregnancy if he wants that. As for the single man who sees in his dream that he is riding on a cloud and sees that it is running quickly, then he will marry a beautiful woman. If he sees that the clouds are taking him, then he is traveling. As for the student of knowledge who sees himself riding on the cloud in his dream, he will become famous because of his brilliance in the field of science that he is studying. As for the one who sees in his dream that the clouds are heading towards him and there is no sign of fear or panic such as thunder or lightning. Or lightning, then he benefits from a blessing or a wish is fulfilled. Whoever dreams that clouds fall to the ground or descend over houses, acres, trees and plants, it indicates heavy rain and rain, a raid, invasion or war. Some interpreters say: Clouds in a dream indicate A great king or a venerable ruler. Whoever sees this mixes with rulers and princes and obtains wealth and eminence from them, and this interpretation applies to men of knowledge and merchants. Whoever dreams of eating clouds will benefit from a blessing such as money or wisdom, and eating clouds in dreams may indicate the superiority of the dreamer and his great abilities. The man. Whoever sees in his dream that he is building a house in the clouds will earn a decent life or gain honor among his people. If he sees in a dream a palace above the clouds, then he will benefit from travel, marriage, or good work, and this interpretation applies to women. As for the person who sees in his dream that he has turned into a cloud that rains on people, this means...
